name: Astec Industries, Inc.
description: Astec Industries, Inc. is a leading manufacturer of specialized equipment for asphalt road building, aggregate processing, pipeline construction, and concrete production. Founded in 1972 and headquartered in Chattanooga, Tennessee, Astec has established a reputation for producing high-quality machinery that meets the rigorous demands of the construction and infrastructure industries. The company operates through several subsidiaries and is known for its innovative solutions, including hot mix asphalt plants, aggregate handling systems, and environmental equipment. Astec's commitment to sustainability is evident in its development of technologies that minimize emissions and enhance energy efficiency. With a diverse product line and a strong focus on research and development, Astec aims to deliver reliable and effective equipment to help customers build and maintain vital infrastructure. The company's mission is to provide the highest quality products and services while fostering a culture of safety, integrity, and environmental stewardship. Astec also emphasizes customer support, offering training, parts, and service to ensure that its equipment operates at peak performance.
